item.description:
Rozhdestvenskaya Yolka

January 8, 2012 from 1 to 4.

Sponsored by Russian Orthodox Church of St.John of Shanghai

Additional info can be found here:

http://www.parishofstjohn.com/docs/2012_elka.jpg


This event is usually very lengthy. It includes religious singing, a Christmas play by kids, Ded Moroz and Snegurochka arrival and traditional New Year's games, rhymes and riddles. This year it will include the performance by the folk dance group from St.Petersgurg "Golden Gates".

group.name: Families with Russian Kids, Moms Club, Playgroups

item.name: Rozhdestvenskaya Yolka
